text: Geek! is the debut EP by the alternative rock band My Bloody Valentine, released in December 1985 on Fever Records. It is the band's first release to feature bassist Debbie Googe. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== All personnel credits adapted from Geek!s liner notes. ;My Bloody Valentine *David Conway – vocals *Kevin Shields – guitar *Debbie Googe – bass *Colm Ó Cíosóig – drums ;Technical personnel *My Bloody Valentine – production *Martin Davey – engineering ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1985 EPs Category:Fever Records EPs Category:My Bloody Valentine (band) EPs
title: Geek!
